EmailTemplate.description: When the EM team accepts an EH/SP escalation by checking a box on the case, a notification should be sent to a subset of EM and CSR teams stating the EM team has accepted the case
EmailTemplate.name: EM Acceptance of Request for SP EM Engagement
EmailTemplate.subject: EM Acceptance of Request for SP EM Engagement {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EM {!User.Email} has accepted the request for SP EM engagement. Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. Product: {!Case.Products__c}. Product Version: {!Case.Versions__c}. Case Creation Date: {!Case.CreatedDate}.
